T01 as ( select R.lot_no, R.record_type, R.qty, R.model, R.line, R.created_at from pur_wh_records R where 1 = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(R.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT('2022-11-30', '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT('2022-11-30', '%Y-%m-%d') union all select M.clotno lot_no, M.record_type, M.qty, M.cpn model, M.line, M.created_at from material_controls M where 1 = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(M.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT('2022-11-30', '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT('2022-11-30', '%Y-%m-%d') ), T02 as ( select T01.*, T.description from T01 left join pur_wh_record_types T on T01.record_type = T.type ) select T02.* from T02 where 1 = 1
and T02.lot_no = 'VN221025*P-0455A*MLD14*B*006'
